extendedInfo.description: Measure distances to objects whose base you can see (and that are on the same level as you).INCLUDES FULL COMMENTED SOURCE CODE (file measure.zip on your sd card).  Shows use of camera preview and sensors.Accurate and useful for everyone.  Really great for programmers learning Android.

reviews.title: A very useful tool
reviews.comment: A very useful quick measuring tool and a clever use of the phone\'s sensors.  It seems pretty accurate.  As a software developer myself, I think it is great that the source code is included.
reviews.author: Steve Dever

reviews.title: Excellent app for measure
reviews.comment: Perfect UI,  resourceful,  provides a great user experience. A perfect buy.
reviews.author: Lalitha Krishnamurthy

reviews.title: A Clever Idea
reviews.comment: Measure uses trigonometry to determine distance by calculating the side of a right triangle. Understanding this with a few tips leads to surprisingly accurate measurements. The instructions say to hold the device 5 ft high. So one time i used a tape measure to find out 5 ft came to neck high for me. Now i know where to hold my tablet. Then the instructions say to aim the camera at the base of the object you want to determine the distance to. But if the object is on a slope, point to the spot on the object directly opposite your toes. Then hold your device steady to get your accurate measurement.
reviews.author: Keithen Hayenga

reviews.title: greatr starting point of virtual reality apps!
reviews.comment: This app demonstrates making use of the camera and other sensors on Android devices to gather information about the physical environment.  With this knowledge Android apps can do all types of smart things, from being a game controller, smart mouse to motion based recognition.  The possibilities are endless, and this is how humans will interact with computers in the future!
reviews.author: Andy Tai

reviews.title: Great for the handyman
reviews.comment: Great for measuring the size of a room. And it comes with the source to add your own cool features.
reviews.author: Brent Gossett
